articles.title: Lindsay Clancy’s lawyer warns she could kill herself if medical needs not met during murder trial
articles.description:
“She’s not a danger to others, that’s for sure. But she’s surely a danger to herself,” said an attorney for Clancy, who is charged with killing her children.

The post Lindsay Clancy’s lawyer warns she could kill herself if medical needs not met during murder trial appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Lindsay Clancy’s lawyer warns she could kill herse

Details:

“She’s not a danger to others, that’s for sure.
